title: Document builder preflight required-field validation
acceptance_criteria: Builder blocks generation when required placeholders are missing; validation errors are deterministic and logged; linked compliance test exists
blockers: Draft citation requires SME/legal confirmation before rule promotion

title: Dossier workspace completeness and deterministic naming
acceptance_criteria: Workspace output uses deterministic naming convention and attachment checklist; missing artifacts are blocked with actionable message
blockers: Draft citation requires SME/legal confirmation before rule promotion

title: Document retrieval retry-safe error contract
acceptance_criteria: Retrieval failures produce clear states; retries preserve context and do not corrupt workspace state; behavior covered by tests
blockers: Draft citation requires SME/legal confirmation before rule promotion

title: Role-gated actions for document operations
acceptance_criteria: Privileged operations require authenticated role; unauthorized attempts are denied and auditable
blockers: Draft citation requires SME/legal confirmation before rule promotion

title: Submission evidence metadata persistence
acceptance_criteria: Evidence metadata (timestamp, dossier, actor, action outcome) persists per submission event; audit records are queryable
blockers: Draft citation requires SME/legal confirmation before rule promotion

title: ESJN and ePazar workflow router
acceptance_criteria: System selects process-specific flow (ESJN or ePazar) and enforces mode-specific validation and messaging
blockers: Draft citation requires SME/legal confirmation before rule promotion

title: ePazar mandatory input-set validation
acceptance_criteria: Action execution is blocked when mandatory ePazar inputs are incomplete; errors identify missing required fields
blockers: Draft citation requires SME/legal confirmation before rule promotion

title: Corrective guidance and retry-safe UX for failed steps
acceptance_criteria: Failed actions provide corrective guidance and preserve retry-safe state transitions
blockers: Draft citation candidate added (pages 14/20/22); SME/legal confirmation required before approval

title: Notice search and dossier opening stabilization
acceptance_criteria: Search results and dossier opening remain stable across pagination/filtering and preserve navigation state
blockers: Draft citation requires SME/legal confirmation before rule promotion

title: Runtime compliance gate approved-rules-only policy loading
acceptance_criteria: Runtime policy loader excludes all non-approved rules; integration test demonstrates inactive draft/pending rules
